          <title>
            <string language="en">The Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Terre</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration of a cross-section of the Earth shows the materials making up each layer.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung eines Querschnitts der Masse zeigt
die Materialien, die herauf jede Schicht bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration d'une section transversale de

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração de um cross-section da terra

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione di una sezione trasversale

            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση μιας διατομής της γης εμφανίζει τα

          </description>
          <description>
